data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wan, Jin-Long, Peng, Xian-Jin (2013): The spiders of the genus Wolongia Zhu, Kim & Song, 1997 from China (Araneae: Tetragnathidae). Zootaxa 3691 (1): 87-134, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3691.1.3
